Our history

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_text_color=”#666666″ text_font_size=”16″ text_line_height=”1.5em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” module_alignment=”left”]

Innovatius Consultants are specialist consultants in the field of Occupational Health, Safety Environmental Management. We focus on providing SHEQ services through consultancy and mentorship of small, medium, and large business, construction projects, manufacturing and corporate.

Innovatius Consultants are also 100% Black Owned Level 1 (135% B-BBEE procurement recognition) We have a dedicated professional team with over 18 Years of experience who utilise their expertise and knowledge to assist clients in achieving a safe and compliant workplace, a team with experience in risk management who provide a practical approach to safety system implementation.

We offer business safety for higher reward and give a complete feasibility and effective level of compliance, standards, safety performance and safety management strategies.

Our Passion

We strive to deliver products and services that best represent our client’s needs.

Value for Money

We go the extra mile to save our client’s costs, by delivering the lowest prices for top quality services.

Service Excellence

We pride ourselves on client satisfaction. No matter the size, we treat all our clients with the same level of quality service.

Our aim is to educate and make a positive contribution to your business, we aim to create an ethos that is shared by our consultants and hope our values will positively impact your business needs. With over 18 years’ experience in the Manufacturing, Oil and gas, Logistics, FMCG, Construction, Mining and Energy sectors we guarantee that you will not be disappointed with the service we provide.

In addition to this we have Special Services with the we offer; this teams focuses on outsourcing particular skills like:

  • Construction Health and Safety Managers.
  • Construction Health and Safety Officers.
  • Nace Coating Inspectors.

SHEQ specialist with 18 years’ experience in the Occupation Health and Safety Field. Responsible for overall management of Innovatius. Operations Manager:
Bevin Small: PMP / SAMTRAC/ ISO 9001 /Legal Compliance Auditor. / CHS Officer

Bevin Small brings a wealth of experience through site operational engagement. Bevin has been involved in Civils, Construction, Electrification and Rail infrastructure for the last 10 years and has 4 years Cathodic Protection experience. Bevin has been involved in the Construction industry since 2005 and has being exposed to most industries and areas of business organizations, He a vast knowledge of Project Management, Tendering, Health and Safety as well as Quality. He is a Legal Compliance Auditor and is registered with the SACPCMP and an active member of SAIOSH and currently completing an International Diploma in Construction Health and Safety.
